item.description:
Charlie Curtis is a master at using hypnosis, NLP, EFT, law of attraction principles and more to help people reach desired states and goals.  He even helps people get rid of diabetes. Once a year, he visits from Pennsylvania to attend the national hypnosis convention here; and he graciously offered to teach us something new at our meetup.  He was a big hit the last time he treated us.

Charlie told me that he's  going to teach and guide us through a 15 minute, proven, altered state process to connect to inner guidance for getting unstuck and getting the creative ideas needed to solve a problem, while at the same time shifting into a palpably deeper peace.
I think it's great to have a repertoire of strategies for connecting to inner peace and your greater Spirit-Self.  Don't you?  I'm sure this will be good!

(If a lot of you sign-up , we might change our location.  So be sure to check/read possible future notices.)

Looking forward to connecting with you and learning together!

Ann
item.how_to_find_us: We're down a long driveway. Look for white mailbox with our name and #276, across from large, old, white house

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community

item.name: Connecting to your inner guidance, with special guest speaker
